vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
καταβρᾰβεύω,
give judgement against one as βραβεύς, and so, deprive one of the prize, deprive one of one's right, with accusative, [NT+8th c.BC+]passive, ὑπὸ Μειδίου καταβραβευθέντα being cast in his suit by means of Meidias, Test. cited in [Refs 4th c.BC+]
__2 with genitive, rule over, ἡ γῆ κ. τῶν λοιπῶν [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to disqualify for a prize, decide against
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to disqualify for a prize, decide against
primarily to give an unfavorable decision as respects a prize; hence, to decide against, Col. 2:18*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tước mất giải thưởng/ phần thưởng. phép ẩn dụ: tước đi sự cứu rỗi
